You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE
Request For Quote

Manage settings for the user experience of the Request for Quote window on the Shopping Cart page or Scaled Cart page. The Request For Quote module's API name is rfq.

Company Required
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	rfq.cmpnyrqrd
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Allow a Buyer to Request a Quote for the Contents of the Shopping Cart
Compatibility	
Scaled Cart page with B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) or later
Shopping Cart page version 2.0 with B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10) or later
Shopping Cart page version 1.0 with B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer '18 (version 4.9) or later
Description Max Length
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	rfq.descmaxlen
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Allow a Buyer to Request a Quote for the Contents of the Shopping Cart
Compatibility	
Scaled Cart page with B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) or later
Shopping Cart page version 2.0 with B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10) or later
Shopping Cart page version 1.0 with B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer '18 (version 4.9) or later
Email Required
CONSIDERATION	VALUE
API Name	rfq.emailrqrd
Externally Safe?	
Usage	Allow a Buyer to Request a Quote for the Contents of the Shopping Cart
Compatibility	
Scaled Cart page with B2B Commerce for Visualforce Winter ’21 (version 4.13) or later
Shopping Cart page version 2.0 with B2B Commerce for Visualforce Spring ’19 (version 4.10) or later
Shopping Cart page version 1.0 with B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer '18 (version 4.9) or later

CONSIDERATION	VALUE

CONSIDERATION	VALUE
